name: Malled
description:
It's that time again. Every year there comes a particular day;  A day where all your humanity is put aside. A day with only one goal.

and that goal is...

A flat screen tv for 15% off.

Find your black friday deal before someone else does, with help from your trusty rocket launcher!

W/A/S/D to move

Left mouse button to shoot

boom sfx by derplayer

background audio by VincePest11

all found on https://freesound.org/
